responses.rationale: 'just one more addition to that' uses a minimiser ('just one more') with an implicit scale contrast (addition to an existing list of reasons) to downplay the new risk.
The segment mentions 'a whole lot of other reasons' (scale) but lacks a minimiser applied to a specific event or risk within that scale.
The segment contains neither a minimiser nor a scale contrast.
The segment lacks a minimiser and a scale contrast used to downplay an event or its significance.
